page.title: 03Hamlets around Eastington
page.content:
The village of Eastington is surrounded by a number of Hamlets built on the sites of early settlements. The majority of these hamlets have no "through" roads and are approached by narrow lanes.
NUPEND _ (North Upper End) _ The largest of the hamlets having approximately 40 dwellings including a pair of thatched cottages used for the sale of car accessories.
NASTEND _ (North East End) _ consists of 7 properties including the 16th. century Nastend Court.
WESTEND _ consists of 8 properties spread along either side of the Eastington to Whitminster road.
